attributes.comment:
i agree with that increasing fees....but make sure that you're going to make your
processing time faster....i've been with here with my family for almost four years
but still my application for I-485 is still pending....i already have four kids (two was
born here) but still my application was not moving......here are the things that
makes me very depressed about waiting on my applications:
i already bought an apartment here but they gave me a high interest rate because

according to them i'm not a permanent
residence.
i pay high taxes for my mortgage and ca'nt apply for tax reduction assistance
(because i lived in a flood area zone) because i'm not a permanent
residence .........i was affected by hurricanes but ca'nt apply for assistance
because according to them i'm not a permanent residence (is that fair?)..i also
paying tax here....
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Emilio E. Marasigan
